verses.verse: To the chief <S%H5329>Musician<s%> <S%H413>upon<s%> <S%H5155>Nehiloth,<s%> A <S%H4210>Psalm<s%> of <S%H1732>David.<s%> Give <S%H238>ear<s%> to my <S%H561>words,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H995>consider<s%> my <S%H1901>meditation.<s%>
Hearken <S%H7181><s%> unto the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of my <S%H7773>cry,<s%> my <S%H4428>King,<s%> and my <S%H430>God:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> thee will I <S%H6419>pray.<s%>

My <S%H6963>voice<s%> shalt thou <S%H8085>hear<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning<s%> will I <S%H6186>direct<s%> my prayer unto thee, and will look <S%H6822>up.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> art <S%H3808>not<s%> a <S%H410>God<s%> that hath <S%H2655>pleasure<s%> in <S%H7562>wickedness:<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1481>dwell<s%> with thee.
Thou shalt <S%H6>destroy<s%> them that <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H3577>leasing:<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H8581>abhor<s%> the <S%H1818>bloody<s%> and <S%H4820>deceitful<s%> <S%H376>man.<s%>

But as for <S%H589>me,<s%> I will <S%H935>come<s%> into thy <S%H1004>house<s%> in the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of thy <S%H2617>mercy:<s%> and in thy <S%H3374>fear<s%> will I <S%H7812>worship<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> thy <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H1964>temple.<s%>

Lead <S%H5148><s%> me, O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> in thy <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> because <S%H4616>of<s%> mine <S%H8324>enemies;<s%> make thy <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H3474>straight<s%> before my <S%H6440>face.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> there is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H3559>faithfulness<s%> in their <S%H6310>mouth;<s%> their inward <S%H7130>part<s%> is very <S%H1942>wickedness;<s%> their <S%H1627>throat<s%> is an <S%H6605>open<s%> <S%H6913>sepulcher;<s%> they <S%H2505>flatter<s%> with their <S%H3956>tongue.<s%>

Destroy <S%H816><s%> thou them, O <S%H430>God;<s%> let them <S%H5307>fall<s%> by their own <S%H4480>counsels;<s%> <S%H4156><s%> cast them <S%H5080>out<s%> in the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of their <S%H6588>transgressions;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> they have <S%H4784>rebelled<s%> against thee.

But let <S%H3605>all<s%> those that put their <S%H2620>trust<s%> in thee <S%H8055>rejoice:<s%> let them <S%H5769>ever<s%> shout for <S%H7442>joy,<s%> because thou <S%H5526>defendest<s%> <S%H5921>them:<s%> let them also that <S%H157>love<s%> thy <S%H8034>name<s%> be <S%H5970>joyful<s%> in thee.
For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H859>thou,<s%> <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> wilt <S%H1288>bless<s%> the <S%H6662>righteous;<s%> with <S%H7522>favor<s%> wilt thou <S%H5849>compass<s%> him as with a <S%H6793>shield.<s%>
